```{r 1st chunk, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```

```{r 2nd chunk, message = FALSE}
pres_election <- function(data = contributions, name_arg) {
  data %>%
    filter(cand_id == name_arg) %>%
    group_by(entity_type, transaction_amt, cand_id) %>%
    summarize(total = n()) %>%
    arrange(desc(transaction_amt)) %>%
    head(20)
}

```


```{r 3rd chunk, message = FALSE}
candidate_lists <- c("P80003353", "P80003338")
map(candidate_lists, pres_election, data = contributions)
```
